targets.rawSql:
WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as label,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_active'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as label,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_sleeping'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,

FROM (

WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_dead'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    concat(Attributes['workflow_name'], ' (', Attributes['error'], ')') as label,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_dead'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] as label,
    count(*) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_worker_last_ping'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label, ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']
)
ORDER BY label

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['signal_name'] as label,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_pending'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 as collector_rate_s

SELECT Time, bucket, count
FROM (
    SELECT
        Time,
        bucket,
        greatest(0, count - lagInFrame(count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY bucket ORDER BY Time)) AS count
    FROM (
        WITH
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
            arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
            case when idx = length(BucketCounts) then inf else ExplicitBounds[idx] end as bucket
        SELECT
            time_bucket as Time,
            bucket,
            sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE
            MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_recv_lag'
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000))
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY Time, bucket
    )
)
WHERE $__timeFilter(Time)

WITH
    30 as collector_rate_s

SELECT Time, bucket, count
FROM (
    SELECT
        Time,
        bucket,
        greatest(0, count - lagInFrame(count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY bucket ORDER BY Time)) AS count
    FROM (
        WITH
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
            arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
            case when idx = length(BucketCounts) then inf else ExplicitBounds[idx] end as bucket
        SELECT
            time_bucket as Time,
            bucket,
            sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE
            MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_pull_duration'
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000))
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY Time, bucket
    )
)
WHERE $__timeFilter(Time)

WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_last_pull_workflows_duration'

    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

    30 as collector_rate_s

WITH 1 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
	SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    concat(Attributes['activity_name'], ' (', Attributes['error'], ')') as label,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_activity_errors'
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
    AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 as collector_rate_s

SELECT Time, bucket, count
FROM (
    SELECT
        Time,
        bucket,
        greatest(0, count - lagInFrame(count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY bucket ORDER BY Time)) AS count
    FROM (
        WITH
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
            arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
            case when idx = length(BucketCounts) then inf else ExplicitBounds[idx] end as bucket
        SELECT
            time_bucket as Time,
            bucket,
            sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE
            MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_loop_iteration_duration'
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000))
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY Time, bucket
    )
)
WHERE $__timeFilter(Time)

WITH
    30 as collector_rate_s,
    4 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        workflow_name as label,
        greatest(0, total_count - lagInFrame(total_count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY workflow_name ORDER BY time)) / $__interval_ms * 1000 as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
            Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
            sum(arraySum(BucketCounts)) as total_count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_loop_iteration_duration'
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND Attributes['workflow_name'] IN array($workflow_name)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY time, workflow_name
    )
)
ORDER BY label

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']
list.label: project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']
list.label: datacenter
list.name: datacenter
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['workflow_name'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY Attributes['workflow_name']
list.label: workflow name
list.name: workflow_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['workflow_name'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY Attributes['workflow_name']
